content.detailedDescription: I walked outside of my house and happened to look west, apparently for no reason. i saw a huge dark shape like a horseshoe, with a few nodules on it, in the sky.I had no doubt that it was a ufo. the object just floated and slowly rotated. it was not drifting despite strong winds.I became extremely excited and nervous. the sighting lasted maybe two minutes. my wife saw it as well, but could not figure out what it was. it was gigantic. i called a friend to tell him to look into the sky, but when i did, it lifted into the clouds,became obscured by them, and i didn't see it again.
content.summary: Very very large, dark shape in sky, at least three times bigger than boeing 747

content.detailedDescription: This is a resubmit. i just filed the report  got kicked off the internet.
content.summary: This is a resubmit. i just filed the report  got kicked off the internet.

content.detailedDescription:
Events of april 22, 1966
the witness provided minnesota mufon with a written account as well as a verbal account. he was 15 years old at the time, attending high school.

the witness said he was flying the craft shown under__________, at the time it flew down the main street of bagley. the witness does not remember where or when he entered the craft.  he thinks he would have played hooky that day.  he remembers bringing a forged excuse slip to school the next day. he recently received access to his school records, but they did not include absence data.

first he was flown to russia, where it was night.  the craft landed (or per later recollection likely hovered) in an unoccupied section of a large city - looking at the atlas after the fact, it most likely was moscow. there an older man conferred with him and counseled him on how to deal with the nightmares that he had been having since his abduction at age 3.  at this time, the witness wrote ,���they [the aliens] said they would let me live my life.���  then he was given complete control of the craft to fly back to bagley. he recognized the great lakes as they flew over them.

the witness stated that he overshot bagley. ���i flew to the far south and west.  when i was flying over the red river valley (at a very low altitude), i wondered why it was so flat. i was surprised by the ship answering me with several views of the red river valley during past geological periods.  the ship had recorded prior events, playing them back to me, making it like actually being there.���

the witness flew on to bagley.  (see map under file 2) he flew the craft, at only a few feet of altitude, down the main street of bagley, and jumped it over the bus, because he wanted someone to see it; he knew he would forget the experience otherwise. he then landed the craft on the outskirts of town in lake lamand park.  he slipped down the ramp and out into the grass, while the grays pretended to do repairs, and got away without being seen.  he made his way the few blocks back to the school and was in time to catch his usual school bus home.  (he regularly took one of the ���later busses��� home.)

the witness reported several other experiences with ets during the course of his life so far.

for a computer animation by the witness of the april 22, 1966 events, see:

http://www.Sunsetpaintingco.Com/ufo/bagley.Html
content.summary: Witness was taken aboard craft and later given control to buzz home town.

content.detailedDescription:
We've had some odd things going on in the last 3 weeks, including seeing a far away light resembling a star that would hover and then zip away...  

20 minutes til 10 pm on tuesday, august 2nd was when it happened. it was dark, but in that post-dusk, ultra blue dark kind of way. a few of the brighter stars directly above us were peeping out at this point. the half-moon, waxing, was easily seen in the low southern sky, bright yellow but starting to turn orange as it dipped towards the horizen (of hills, for us.) it was clear of clouds, but a bit hazy, with no wind. i was on the deck, talking to my husband (who also witnessed the ufo) after the heat of the day, staring out vaguely westwards when out of the west/southwest i noticed some bright lights out of my peripheral vision, completely out of place.

i stood up to see more clearly, as some leaves from a tree were in my way a bit. when i did i saw a couple of yellow lights next to each other wink out, followed by a red light-- like a super bright star-- flash, then get brighter-- much more so than any plane light, almost seeming to spin rapidly, then dim out swiftly until it disappeared. i exclaimed to my husband what i saw, thinking to myself that it was rather odd, and he only had time to see the end flash of the red light. however, i had no real opinion of what i was seeing at that point because the entire episode happened so quickly i didn't get a chance to really see it well enough to ascertain anything. 

but then, just as my husband was standing up to join me, yellow lights (in the exact position of the previous yellow lights and red spinning light) started to wink on-- all in a row-- round, clear, not too bright, but easily seen. one at a time they came on, and as they did, they appeared to be part of a disk-like object, about the size of a nickel held at arm's length to my perspective. the lights went on one at a time in a clock-wise direction at the rate of perhaps 2 per second. the object was cocked at a slight angle so that we saw slightly more of the bottom-side than the top-side. it was clear of the hills, but not too far above them. i yelped and my husband moved over to see better, then exclaimed that he was running in to get that fancy new camera of his. the lights then blinked off in a clock-wise direction, and without the lights on, the thing may as well have been invisible in the dark. nothing more happened that night, though i can assure you we scanned the skies for at least an hour after that!

if you can imagine holding a nickel at arm's lenth and putting little lights around the rim, that's pretty close to what i would describe. i didn't believe what i was seeing even as i was looking at it-- and wondered if someone was pulling a prank with a balloon. though it would have had to have been, at the distance we saw it, a very large one. (at least 15 feet in diameter, but i'm guessing much more than that.) we live out in the hocking hills not far from old man's cave off h. 664, and have few neighbors, it would not be a very good place for a hoax.

i've tried to think of what it could have been besides a high tech vehicle of some sort. it was not a conventional vehicle. not a plane, it hovered perfectly still. not a helicopter, as that close it would have made noise and what we saw was completely silent. 

other related sighting: the same red light that appears, flashes, spins, then dims out that i saw in between the yellow rim lights showed up again at about 10:01 pm the following evening, on august 3rd, in almost the same position, but a little further south in the sky. this time, there were no yellow rim lights however. we plan to go out tonight before 10 to see if there is any further activity.

other note: we've seen some dark drab olive green military helicopters in the region in the last month, which is something neither of us have seen in this area ever in the years we've lived in this area of ohio. so there is a chance that maybe what we saw was part of some test i suppose.
content.summary: A bright red light that dimmed, followed by a row of yellow round lights lighting up one at a time in a clockwise pattern, revealing a disk shape.

content.detailedDescription: My 16 year old daughter and her friend were sitting outside on the patio. the weather was hot and the sky was clear.  they noticed a flash that lit up the sky like lightning.  when they looked up they saw a large deep blue sphere dropping from high in the sky down behind the house. it had a blue, green, white glow or halo around it. they could'nt tell if it was 1/2 a mile or 100 miles away. it was the size of a marble from where they sat. it was moving very fast. it did not make a sound.  i asked if it had been an exploding transformer or a light falling from the nearby football stadium and they said it started high in the air . they thought it was an airplane but it was too large and it was a deep blue sphere.
content.summary: Bright flash. object desended east to west to the horizon in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i got up and went outside and looked to the west,toward the big horn mt.S,i saw what i thought was a large star at first but was flashing diffrent colors,i got my binoculars and it was flashing red and blue randomly, it shrunk down to a white ball than kind of dissapeared for a split second than shot out of sight at a 10:00 angle. i have never seen a ufo before,and dont really know what this was,but it was really fast. this only lasted for about two or three minutes. i hope someone else saw it too.
what could it have been????????? this i know was not an airplane, no plane could be sitting still and than shoot off as fast as this did.
        thank you
          jim
content.summary: Blue and red flashing lights shrunk down to small white ball than shot out of sight at 10:00 position

content.detailedDescription: Saw a very long craft moving through space at around 12:15 am in illinois, but i am sure this craft could have been seen by anyone in the u.S. that was watching the sky that night. it had two lights one on each end that could be seen. the craft blocked the light of distant stars as it flew between closer ones or at least this is how it appeared to me. as this ship neared the constellation scutum there was this bright flash of light it then moved directly toward were the flash appeared. it seemed as if the flash had created a hole and the craft seemed to travel into it.   this sighting lasted approx. 5 minutes, it moved from north to south.
content.summary: Very long craft moving through space with 2 visible lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone outside my home in se loveland, about 50 mi n of denver and 2.5 miles west of i-25 and the 402 exit, just after 4 am on 7/28/06 to watch the aquarid meteor shower. the night was clear and cloudless with just the barest hint of approaching dawn on the eastern horizon, and an occasional airliner or 2 from denver international airport was visible far to the se. 

after spotting 1 or 2 unremarkable meteor trails in the southern sky within half an hour, i was about to go back inside when i noticed a formation of 3 faint unblinking starlike objects in a triangle formation in the mid southern sky moving n/ne just slower than airliner speed. it was positioned "backwards" as it were, with the point of the triangle in the rear of the direction it was travelling. it also was a longer distance from the front two objects to the rear, giving the appearance of a long thin triangle. as soon as i saw all 3 distinct points of light i knew it was not a conventional aircraft. size was unknown but my extended thumbnail at arms length would just fit in each point of the group. the faintness of the objects implied to me great distance and great size.

other stars could be seen behind the objects as they travelled so it didn't appear to be a single object. when the formation was almost directly overhead i noticed another starlike object, somewhat brighter, that was travelling to the south and which crossed the formation's path, although i don't know if the objects had any relation to each other and i kept my attention on the formation as the other object passed by. 

no noise was heard nor any other effects from the objects. after watching for approx. 1 minute the objects began to fade and i lost sight of them about midway into the northern sky. it almost seems like they stopped in the sky but due to their faintness that's only speculation. further scanning of the sky revealed no more objects or meteors and the sky was beginning to brighten towards dawn.
content.summary: 3 star formation over loveland, co

content.detailedDescription:
On approximately august 8th, 2002, at approximately 3:00 pm, i was exiting a dunkin donuts shop on american legion highway, just down the street from bell circle (a traffic rotary) in revere, massachusetts.

the day was bright and sunny, with a blue sky and fluffy clouds. the temperature was approximately 70 degrees. it was a breezy day.

upon exiting the store, i glanced across the 4-lane divided american legion highway toward the small getty gas station directly across the highway from the donut shop.

my attention was immediately drawn to a solid black sphere, approximately the size of a large beach ball (about 5 feet in diameter) traveling no more than 30 feet in the air, coming from the direction of the bell circle traffic rotary. it was traveling in a straight line, at approximately 20 miles per hour, and its path was located behind the getty station, heading in the direction of the 11-story comfort inn hotel which is located just past the getty station, if one is facing in a northerly direction in front of the station.

at first glance, i thought it was a child's large balloon, but the day was very breezy, and this object was traveling in a straight line, never once fluttering or wavering in its flight toward the gas station. the object was a dull, solid black in color, with absolutely no protrusions, or any other type of irregularities on it's surface... it was just a solid, dull black sphere.

as i watched the object, it continued its straight-line path toward the comfort inn hotel. the traffic was light on the highway, and with the absence of vehicular traffic noise, i noted that i could hear no sound at all coming fron the object.

as it approached the comfort inn hotel, its altitude was at about the 3rd story level, and as it got closer, it began to climb at approximately a 50-degree angle until it cleared the roof of the hotel, at which time it leveled off for a few seconds, then began climbing again at the same angle.

to get a better viewing angle, i crossed the highway and positioned myself directly behind the object, and i could see that it was still traveling in an absolute straight-line attitude, with a total absence of flutter or wavering, even though the tree branches and foliage were swaying with the breezes.

the object once again interrupted its climb, and began to descend at an approximately 40-degree angle, heading for the roof the new england confectionary company (necco candy) building, located in the next lot north of the comfort inn, again if one is facing in a northerly direction next to the getty station.

when the object came within 15-20 feet of the roof of the necco building, it again leveled off and traveled along the length of the roof, until it cleared the building.

at this point, the object once again began to climb on its 50-degree angle, in its straight-line attitude, heading for a large cloud. it's speed never wavered from the approximate 20 miles per hour it was traveling when i first spotted it.

still behind the object, i watched it climb toward the cloud until it was no longer visible.

the time-frame from when i first spotted the object, until it disappeared from view was approximately 1 1/2 minutes, as best i can recall.

there were no people on foot in the immediate vicinity, and no people in the few vehicles going by seemed to notice it, even though i was quite conspicuous in my observation of it, even pointing toward it to try and get the attention of someone in one of the vehicles. as far as i could determine, i was the only one on the highway who saw the object, but i'm positive that someone must have seen it as it flew over the always-busy bell circle traffic rotary. i passed the rotary on my way home, but could see nobody on foot who may have seen the object.

to say that what i saw that day was strange and very highly unusual would be a monumental understatement! it was a very exciting thing to see, and i can say without a doubt that this was no beach ball, child's balloon, or any balloon for that matter. this object, or craft, ot whatever it was, seemed to be intelligently controlled, in my personal opinion.

an exciting day in my life, and one that i'll never forget.

i assure all of you that this story is absolutely true.
content.summary: 5-foot diameter dull-black noiseless sphere, buzzing buildings

content.detailedDescription: My sister was sitting outside with a group of toddlers watching them play. she saw a cigar shaped shiny object with no wings fly into a cloud. it was a fairly cloudless day with just a few clouds in the sky. she watched the object fly into a cloud and since the object was strange looking.She watched to see it come out the other side of the cloud, but it never did.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft flew into cloud but didn't exit on other side

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on a dead-end road (where i live). it was past sunset. i noticed a cigar-shaped yellow orange light very low on the horizon. i thought it was an interesting trick of the moon and clouds, but then i noticed another directly to its right - identical in size and shape, but a bit dimmer. wow, i thought, that is indeed an interesting trick of moon and clouds, as the space the lights spanned was much wider than the moon appears. still thinking it was an optical illusion, i continued to where my vision of the lights was blocked by foliage. i went to look for the "moon" phenomenon later and could not find it. today (august 2) i realized that the moon should not be so low on the horizon directly north, unless one is in antarctica.
content.summary: Two of them close together, side by side, yellow orange.
Me and my family saw 2 sphrical discs over our head

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend where traveling down town hall road late at night 2am or so and noticed two bright lights hovering just over the treeline. as we got closer the lights got bigger. at first we thought wow those are ufos. we wereboth terriffed and drove right passed the objects we did not even look back when we got home we were so freaked out all we could do is laugh.We have only told a couple of people since then and we still cant believe it.Wow.We will never be the same.
content.summary: Very bright round objects spotted hovering above ground over field off of townhall road in belleville il

content.detailedDescription: We were watchin the stars wen we saw a triangle shaped stars like 3 stars made a triangle and it was jus still lik it was a star but then 5mins later it started flyin which we thought was pretty weird and we cud see that they were all connected by some kind of line it was really weird and then it like rotated and then disapeared.At first we thought it was lik warplanes or somethin goin to iraq until we saw the lines.
content.summary: We were watchin the sky wen we saw 3 starlike objects connected flyin through the air

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my deck facing south when i noticed a bright star like object that was moving in the sky slowly and appeared to be at a high altitude like a jet airliner. the observed it for about one minute coming towards me and then it began to fade slowly and disappeared completely. i continued to watch to see if it would pass over because i thought it might have been landing lights on a plane. i never heard or saw anything pass over. this was between 8:30 pm and 9:00 pm in the evening. i dont know what it was but it seemed odd because of the clear skies not to see it if it had any type of lighting like on aircraft.
content.summary: Bright star like object that was moving and slowly faded away.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my three children were in our yard roasting marshmellows.  i noticed a satellite traveling across the sky and pointed it out to the kids.  (i remember watching for satellites in my parents yard when i was young)  hoping to see another i was watching the sky somewhat closely when i saw a similiar light traveling south east.  it became brighter than any star in the sky, almost with the intensity of the moon but still star size.  then the light faded out.  not like a switch had been turned off but a slow fade that lasted maybe two seconds.  the light returned to its original glow and continued forward for about five to ten seconds and then faded out completly.
content.summary: Almost like a satellite, but different

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on the beach infront of our house on the night of the full moon, mid july. she mentioned seeing a light that disappeared. i didn't think much of it. later when we returned to the house we noticed a kite flying near the house that kids had tied light sticks too. it was strange looking so i deceided to shine a q beam flashlight on the kite to prove to my wife that the object was a kite. while shining the flashlight in the sky, i noticed 3 lights, in a row, horizontal, over the ocean, maybe 20 degrees above the horizon and about the size of a small marble. the left one faded, then the center faded, then the right one faded. they were illuminated long enough for me to say, "what the #*%! is that" and drop the flashlight. we then returned to the beach and less that five minutes later witnessed the same type of  event with greater number of lights, growing off of a beginning one and forming a string of maybe 10 lights. this time much farther away, smaller that a pea at arms length. it happened twice, 30 seconds apart, second one having greater number of lights. total time each formation was illuminated was 10 - 15 seconds. these were not flares or fireworks. they moved with precission on a perfect horizontal path. silent. like a glowing string of pearls. i believe, a group of people on a neighboring deck witnessed the same event. i have yet to talk about it with them.

i first thought the object were fireworks but they hovered and moved horizontal. when i we saw them on the second time it was confirmed that they were not fireworks.
when we saw the lights, the second time they appeared near a large cloud formation.

we were completed fascinated when we witnessed this. i have never seen anything that i could not easily explain. i was just wishing i had my camera!
content.summary: Strings of lights in the sky, over the ocean, one would appear others would follow
Pictures of object taken from pool area

content.detailedDescription:
When i was between the age of seven and 10 years old, my father and i were driving home from a movie.  it was the late seventies and my father and i were wearing matching blue nylon vests that were popular back then.  it had to be fall or winter then.  as we drove home i noticed that the streets were empty of people and most of all activity.  it wasnt that late maybe 8pm or 9pm so i thought it was odd.  i mentioned this to my father, but he was oblivious.  i noticed all the lights were on at the stores and homes but absolutely no people were around. no cars nobody walking.  as we turned down our street, i noticed a huge orange object hovering about 500 feet or so off the ground and it was so large that i cant say how far away it was maybe 3-10 miles away.  it was silent and just a bright orange glowing oval/disc shaped object.  it was probably as big as a couple of football fields.  i told my father, but he said it was just the moon.  i then looked out the passenger window upwards and saw the moon overhead.  i told him that the moon was up there and he looked up through the windshield of the car and saw it and then looked at the object again.  he stopped the car and put it in park.  he opened the door and stepped out to get a better look.  i heard him make a sound of amazement as he stood staring at the object for a few minutes.  this object made no noise, had no visible engines no real detail except for the orange glow it emmitted against the night sky.  i looked like it was hovering over lax from where we were at.  the next thing i remember was waking up in bed about 5 or 6 hours later fully clothed and my shoes on.  i was still wearing the blue vest and all.  i quickly rushed into my  parents room only to find my father lying in bed fully clothed and in a deep sleep.  i mentioned it to him the next morning and he didnt remember a thing.  the car was parked in the front of the garage too.  i asked my frieds in the neighborhood and at school, but nobody i talked to remembers seeing it.  i figured it was a dream and in time i also had forgotten about the incident for many years.  it wasnt until about 10 years ago that i remembered what had happend in better detail.  i cant remember what year it was exactly, but around that time i remember suffering from chronic nose bleeds.  i never had that problem when i was younger and it only lasted for a few years or so.  

i dont know if i was abducted, but i do remeber a dream i had as a child.  in my dream at the time my father was looking at the object i noticed some movement to my right and looked out the window.  i noticed about 10 people/humanoids peering behind trees and behind houses and they all just looked at us at the same time. they quickly started to approach the car.  my father said something to them and thats the last thing i remember from my dream. 

i dont know if this mufon thing is on the up and up, but i havent had any other incidents since then nor do i remember anything else.  i dont think i have any implants in me but then again i have never checked for any.  i dont want some secret agency spying on me or taking me into some secret hangar to inspect me so i would like to stay anonymous as possible.  i do believe in alien life and ufos visiting this planet or dimension.  i hope that someone else who possibly remembers this incident will read this and write his/her experience on this site for others to read and come forward.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright glowing (orange) disc shaped object hovering over the south bay area of los angeles.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 11pm my parents were relaxing outside after work. i went out to join them and my dad said he had just seen a strange object in the sky. he said it was a pitch black shape (he wasn't sure on the exact shape as it moved quickly). the sky was a dark grey with slight orange tint from the street lights but this object was pitch black and obscured everything - background glow and stars - as it went. it took 5-7 seconds to go across the sky. he described it as "in star trek talk - it was something under a cloaking device - pitch black - darker than anything else in the sky". it made no noise.  

a few minutes later both of my parents and i saw another strange object. i'm not sure if it's related so am mentioning it too. it was a triangle of red lights with one red flashing light at the back. it wasnt the standard red and white flashing lights and obvious winged shape of a plane. it moved slowly compared to the other planes in the sky - a few minutes to move across the sky (others were overtaking it). and it also made no noise that i could hear. it could have been at high altitude - it was hard to judge due to being 11pm.
content.summary: Black object blocking out everything, followed by a smaller red triangle of lights

content.detailedDescription:
this incident happened last friday night.  i work in washington dc, and was driving to deep creek lake, maryland, where my family has a property on turkey neck road.  turkey neck road is in the mountains of western maryland, and is dominated by farmland, and in by the lake, vacation cottages.  when i got to turkey neck, it was about 11:35 p.M., and i noticed a bright flashing light emanating from over the hills to the left.  it lit the sky with considerable power.  rather than turn right to head in to the cottage, i turned left to see if i could find the source of the strange light. it seemed to be close by.
   as i drove up the hill, i thought i saw the light through some trees, but that vantage quickly became obscured again.  approximately 1 mile later, i got to the intersection of turkey neck and the highway (whose number escapes me for the moment).  and there, right across the two-laned highway was the light.  it was very bright (though not blinding) and flicked on and off in a strobing manner.  it was at treetop level, but was just behind the treeline a little bit.  i stopped for a moment, and an 18 wheeled truck passed by.  the truck slowed--presumably to look at the light as well, and drove off.  i would describe the light as kind of cigar shaped, and it had sectional lines of some kind in it, rather than just a single, unitary bulb.  it might have been several feet long in length.  i watched for a few moments longer, turned around and went to the cottage.  at about 2 a.M., i walked down by the lake to see if i could see any trace of the light, and its beam could still be seen in the distance lighting up the sky.  
   the next day i compared notes with some relatives who had also come up the night before.  they had seen the light too, and found it as strange as i had.  a few of us drove out to the spot in daylight, and walked across the road to see if we could see anything, but there was nothing there.  just trees, and behind them, farm fields.  we did not venture onto the property.  that night, the light did not come back.
   the farm on which this occurred usually sells beans, peppers, and other produce in mid to late august.  i will watch for the sale, and take that opportunity to query them about this event.  if mufon is interested, i will keep you posted as to the results.  it doesn't sound like much in the telling, i'm afraid.  the experience was far more intriguing than words can convey.  i am mostly writing in case others have written of this event.  in the absence of an earthly explanation, i will spend the rest of my life regretting that i didn't get out of my jeep, walk across the road, and take a closer look at the light when it was right there in front of me!

billy walsh
sunday, july 30, 2006
content.summary: A powerful, strobing light at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription: My name is richard miller, i am 69 years old,,,in 1947 my brother dale and i where playing marbles next to the road in the front yard,all of a sudden the ground turned gold colored, every thing turned gold colored, i looked at my brother,his face was gold, i looked up to see five space ships, they where just sitting right above us,very close to the ground, they where in the v formation, the lead ship was just sitting right above us, they where right above the telephone pole, i could have hit them with a rock, the ships made a hissing noise,no other sounds,the bottom of the ships where smooth, no seems, no windows, around the edges of the ships there was a three foot rainbow of colored gases, the top of the ships had a smooth dome,saucer shaped like the ones in the movie war of the worlds, the lead ship set above my brother and i for about ten minuts, then it began to move forward across the street very slow, into our apricot orchard, i walked along following them, right under the lead ship, the ships where about 50 yards into the orchard, they stoped again, the five ships grouped closer in formation, they just set there again, right above my brother and i,i could see them very clearly, then the five ships went straight into space, i cant describe the speed wich they left the earth, fast as the blink of the eye, they darted into space, from sittig there to outer space, it seemed like one second,,,the following week the five ships appeared over lake merit in oakland california, on the fourth of july, during the fire works over the lake, all the spot lights where pointed at the ships, they moved from side to side in darting motions, then they left into space again, the next day the sighting and photos where published in the oakland tribune news papers,,,to describe the demenciones of the ships, i would say they where about 60 to 70 feet across, slight radius to bottom and top, with a smooth dome on top, gold metalic in color, very smooth,,, i will never forget the details of this event,  thanks richard miller
content.summary: The year was 1947 bright gold saucers, they stoped right above my home,there where five, rainbo colored gas around edges of shipes, they where very close to ground,

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and walked outside to smoke a cigarette, because my mom does not want me smoking in the house. i looked up at the sky to see if it was a clear sky. i saw some stars in the sky and they looked faded because of the lights that come from downtown chicago. all of a sudden i saw a very bright light in the sky that looked like a star. it was moving very slow in the sky for about 10 seconds before it faded away. my sighting started at 4:26 am
content.summary: Dissapering floating bright star

content.detailedDescription:
Outside in the backyard letting the dog out.  looked up, saw a shooting star, decided to look for a few minutes to see if i could see more.  then, directly overhead, i noticed three star-like objects in triangle formation moving south to north.  

i had originally been unsure whether i was seeing one large triangular object or three separate objects.   then i noticed that i could see stars between the moving objects and decided that they must be separate objects.  also, after that determination was made, at least one of the objects made very quick movements out of the formation, then back in, although the triangle was not the same shape afterwards.

the triangle kind of bent and warped as it moved, so i surmise that all of the objects were probably moving in varying patterns.  

i looked for any signs of strobes or running lights, but found none.  

this was a very strange feeling to see this.  the fluid motion of the triangle gave the feel that these things could just move any way they wanted to.  

as for the size, the objects were about as large and the same brilliance as a star.  the triangle they formed itself approximately as wide as my fist when i held up my outstretched arm.

whatever they were, they were way way up there.   no sound.  no lights. 

i would have thought they were maybe satellites or something.  but moving around like that, i really don't think so.  

now, i know a lot of people are going to probably say these were planes or jets, since i do live in the flight path of a major airport about 40 miles away (dfw).  but i am telling you this were not planes.  they just did not move like that, the snakelike movement of them individually, making that triangle fluid.

from the time i saw them directly overhead till i lost them in the city lights to the north, was about 4 or 5 minutes.  i would say that i watched them from about 90 degrees to about 60 degrees before i lost them in the lights.  

very strange.
content.summary: Three star-like objects in triangle formation moving south to north.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving in rt46 in clifton, nj at 9:23 pm.  i happened to look at the clock and then out my window.  i saw this weird thing hovering in the sky.  it was sort of cigar shaped and it was yellow and orange colored.  it seemed to be giving off light, and it was vertical.  i only saw it for about a minute or so because then the highway curved and there was a tall brick wall.  about two minutes later there was a clearing and i could see the sky again but whatever it was, was gone. the only thing i kept saying to my husband is what the hell is that??  but he was driving and couldn't really see it.  when i knew that it was gone i looked at the clock again and it was 9:25 pm.
content.summary: Cigar shape hovered in an uprite position

content.detailedDescription: Saw a kite like object chasing an airplane with three distinct lights on it red, green blue in each corner. he lights did not blend into each other. there was a wire type tail hanging off the back of the object. after a few seconds of observing this it seemed to quit following the plane and sped off at an incredible rate of speed that made the airplane look like it was flying still.
content.summary: Object tailing a plane then just took off. 3 distint lights in each corner

content.detailedDescription:
Time: approx. 11:10 pm est

place: shermans dale, pa.
approx. 15 mi. wnw from harrisburg, pa.
approx. 25 mi. wnw from harrisburg international airport.

weather: partially overcast from an afternoon t-storm

observed: object traveling abnormally fast, altitude of normal
flight path to harrisburg international airport, direction
intersecting normal flight path, movement erratic and luminosity
with low rapid emission.  nothing spectacular but abnormal.

i was in the driveway of my home getting air and looking at stars,
airplanes and lightning bugs flying about before going to bed.

the location is in a normal landing approach from the wnw to
harrisburg international airport.  planes normally come from
nw to se then turn e to the airport runway after clearing a
mountain.

what caught my attention was this object (coming from wnw),
appearing at approach altitude harrisburg international, but
at excessive speed and off nw approach.  normally approaching
planes have their marker light flashing methodically and when
off reappear in the direction of their trajectory.

as this object traveled the light appeared to intermittently
displace itself from its normal trajectory.

at first, at distance, i thought the object was a plane slightly
off path, and lights perhaps obscured by overcast clouds.

the object (only lights visible) was coming in my direction from
the wnw to pass south of me.  it appeared to cross the approach path
to harrisburg international at near the approach altitude.  the 
speed was faster than normal approaches and as the object began to
disappear behind a large tree, i walked quickly some 100 feet down
the road to keep it in sight.

what could be described as the white marker light was blinking 
abnormally fast with low emission.  the light intermittently appeared
behind then above normal trajectory.  in the final moments observed
the light appeared as 2 objects, with 1 substantially higher than the
other, (an impossibility at the apparent distance and altitude).
the total observed duration was approx. 20-30 seconds, terminating in
the object suddenly disappearing either behind cloud cover or otherwise.
after it disappeared, i called my son (whose eye are better) to come out
for a chance reappearance (no reappearance).
i stayed out (watchful) for about 90 minutes more and saw only planes
and a few shooting stars.  lots of lightning bugs.

feelings: i wished for a closer and longer observation.  it instilled no
fear or emotion (guessing distance at a mile or so), other than the
liking something more conclusive.

pictures/videos:   sorry, none.  i was on my way to bed.

after the appearance of 2 simultaneous objects then disappearance i
knew planes can't do that.  i've been on 2 aircraft carriers, watched
lots of take-offs, landings and maneuvers.  this didn't fit.
content.summary: Object appeared at flight approach path altitude at off angle, higher rate of speed.  marker lights blinking fast, odd pattern, low emission, split to 2 then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself seen a large sphere descending over a beige & green home on north austin drive in fayetteville, arkansas. we were driving home from work at about 1am and this object appeared to drop quickly down from a cloud. we drove around trying to see exactly where it was, in case it landed. it hovered in one place. finally, we drove down north austin and in the middle of the neighborhood street it remained over that one house. we parked on the corner and just watched it. it was there at least one hour. it looked like a white ball with a cross of light shining off the sides of it. a light came on at the corner of the home briefly and the sphere shot straight up in the air and was gone. no sound at all. very spooky.
content.summary: A friend and myself seen a large sphere descending over a beige & green home on north austin drive in fayetteville, arkansas

content.detailedDescription:
The subject was a dark gray craft, square in my estimation (slightly rectangular in my wife's) moving southeast from johnson county, kansas into jackson county, missouri.  i was driving east on 83rd street a few blocks east of mission road.  our view was intermittent because of trees along 83rd street.   the craft moved across 83rd street then out of sight before we reached high drive where we turned north. it moved at a moderate rate of speed for an aircraft,seeming to "float along." i heard no sound, but the car windows were closed and the air conditioner blower was on high.  with such a brief observation it is difficult to estimate size, altitude and speed, but i would guess 50-100 feet square, under 1000 feet and 75 miles an hour

the craft attracted my attention because of its shape.  i am a retired naval reserve air intelligence officer and familiar with most things that fly.  i never saw anything in the air before that looked like this.  my first thought was that it was possibly a ufo.  i did not have a camera with me.

i have long been convinced of the probability that ufos are real but never expected to see one.  i took it rather matter-of-factly that i might now have seen one and didn't consider it to be a particularly singular event.  my family convinced me it should be reported, even though i have few details to offer.  perhaps it will corroborate another sighting.
content.summary: Driving e. on 83rd st e of mission rd. saw gray,square craft moving se,

content.detailedDescription: One evening my wife and i were at my father in laws house visiting, and when we left we decided to sit in this yard and look at the stars. he lives on top of a big hill and the view is wonderful,as we gazed i noticed in the distance lightes on top of the mountain. i though it was people in a four wheel drive vehical, until the lightes came up out of the trees vertical with the tops of them. the lightes went down to the ground and then back up again, this went on for 15 minutes and then disopered.My wife and i were puzzeled that night but even more so the next day, because my friend lives at the foot of jacks mountain we asked him to take us to the top of the mountain wear the road is. his reply was what are you talking about there is no road up there. then he told us that people have bin seeing thing for years in fergason valley.     this hole event has taken place in a small town in the middle of pennsylvania called lewistown. people in lewistown are very conservative like any other small town. but i have heard stories for years, and i would love to see someone investigate. just resently i heard the lights over mc vaytown were back, similar story to my just on the next mountain over. this sighting was heavily reported people claimed they seen black hellicopters checking out the area.Let me know what you think. if there is any confuson about my address, i now live in philly and when i have any vacation we take my son to lewistown to visit with grandparents.    craig bandy
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I noticed lights in the woods
